class.name: Skin
class.brief_description: A list of inverse bind poses and corresponding bones.
class.description: [Skin] contains a list of bind pose matrices and a list of either bone names if bones are named or bone indices if bones are not named. The bind pose matrix, also called offset matrix or inverse bind matrix, is a [Transform3D] offset that is multiplied with a bone's transform to get from vertex space to bone space. Used by [Skeleton3D] and [GPUParticles3D].

method.name: add_bind
method.description: Adds a bind pose matrix of [param pose] and associated bone index [param bone] to the bind pose list and increases the bind count by 1.

method.name: add_named_bind
method.description: Like [method add_bind] but adds a bone [param name] instead of a bone index.

method.name: get_bind_bone
method.description: Returns the bone index associated with bind pose [param bind_index].

method.name: get_bind_count
method.description: Returns the length of the bind pose list.

method.name: get_bind_name
method.description: Returns the bone name associated with bind pose [param bind_index].

method.name: get_bind_pose
method.description: Returns the bind pose matrix at [param bind_index].

method.name: set_bind_bone
method.description: Sets the bone index of bind pose [param bind_index] to the given index [param bone].

method.name: set_bind_count
method.description: Resizes the bind pose list to a length of [param bind_count].

method.name: set_bind_name
method.description: Sets the name of the bone in bind pose [param bind_index] to [param name].

method.name: set_bind_pose
method.description: Assigns the bind pose [param bind_index] with the given offset matrix [param pose].
